alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 7:52PM EDT until August 12 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ORANGE COUNTY... At 752 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bloomingburg, or 8 miles south of Ellenville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Newburgh, Walden, New Windsor, Gardnertown, Montgomery, Orange Lake, Firthcliffe, Vails Gate, Balmville, Cornwall On Hudson, Maybrook, Pine Bush, Circleville, and Bullville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
